title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat Off Polar Bear PSA 1, Speaker SGC 3, T205 Johnson SGC 1
author: dmcshea

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb Bat Off Polar Bear PSA 1, Speaker SGC 3, T205 Johnson SGC 1
posts.post_content:
**ALL CARDS SOLD**

The Cobb has a couple small spots of paper loss on the front with some slight creasing and well rounded corners but colors are nice and the face and lettering look sharp.  

The Speaker has slight creasing but the background and details all look great.

The Johnson has plenty of wear and tear to it but has nice appeal to it for a battered up "1"


Asking:

Cobb - $2900
Speaker $1100
Johnson $600

Prices include shipping and insurance.  DM me for questions.
